@Eastmad @remotesynth Even if the only markup coming down the wire is approx: <div id="some-big-js-app"></div> markup is still involved. But sure, developers might be using less markup or an abstraction with pre-processing. And authors may use abstractions. But still, the M in JAMstack is Markup.
